QuestData.Title: Containment
QuestData.Description: My forces are in absolute shambles, and Malygos' assailants just keep coming.$B$BI fear that the worst has yet to come.$B$BYou must engage them until their leader, Cyanigosa, comes. Only her death will stop the invasion and save Dalaran.$B$BSpeak to me again when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lieutenant Sinclari in the Violet Hold wants you to put an end to the blue dragon invasion force. You are to speak to her again once Cyanigosa is slain.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, hero!$B$BDalaran is safe for another day because of your bravery.
